works.description:
I have searched for the following  
excerpt "First, I searched some of the important keywords such as "Never  
for This Site" and "Not Now" on all the files and found that this function
 
is controlled by a few javascript .js files" which I have written in my
own  
words to find the following infringing URLs.

This is original work by me and I hold the copyright of the content. After
 
investigating the infringing URLs, the reported URLs have copied my whole 

post along with images (some even hotlinked).

Kindly take appropriate action.
